results.title: Times have changed
results.creator_credit: Lillian Murray, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Lillian Murray has worked in the offices of Legacy in Melbourne’s CBD for the last 29 years. It is her home away from home and she reflects on the technological changes there as well as the good times and the great people she has the pleasure to work with.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lillian Murray, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Lillian Murray has worked in the offices of Legacy in Melbourne’s CBD for the last 29 years. It is her home away from home and she reflects on the technological changes there as well as the good times and the great people she has the pleasure to work with.

results.title: 1946 : my first year nursing
results.creator_credit: Jean Cussen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Jean Cussen’s father returned from the war, she took up nursing at the Children’s Hospital in Carlton. She provides, in rich detail, her time there, the children she cared for and how caring for these poor children brought the staff so much pleasure.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jean Cussen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Dose of reality
results.creator_credit: Andrew Dobbyn, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Andrew Dobbyn feels he has lived a privileged life. A baby boomer with a war veteran father, Dobbyn’s family did what they could to help the wives and children of those who didn’t return from the war. Despite this, Dobbyn felt he could be doing more and highlights two events in his life that showed him just how lucky he is.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Dobbyn, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Legacy : a promise for the future : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Six members of Melbourne Legacy give their individual stories of how they got into contact with Legacy. Whether they are survivors of war, employees of Legacy or the children of soldiers, Legacy manages make a significant impression on the lives of its members and provides inspiration for future generations.

group_works.title: My truth
group_works.creator_credit: Vladimir Keca, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My truth
results.creator_credit: Vladimir Keca, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vladimir Keca lived a sheltered life in a remote part of the former Yugoslavia with his grandparents. But once war broke out, he was removed from his comfort zone and, while it changed everything, Keca is not so sure that it was all bad.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vladimir Keca, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: One day at the park
results.creator_credit: Yasmin Blyth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A terrible, life-threatening accident changed Yasmin Blyth’s life, allowing her to see it through new eyes and appreciate the simple things.

results.title: Becoming me
results.creator_credit: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Tyson Cunningham can’t express himself, music does it for him. Although he has long given up dreams of fronting a band like his brother, music is still everything to him, and expresses his emotional life like nothing else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: On a Sunday he went fishing
results.creator_credit: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

video_links.name: On a Sunday he went fishing

results.brief_description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.

results.title: Ride
results.creator_credit: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: BMX is life
results.creator_credit: Harley Van Belkolm, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Riding and doing tricks on his BMX is when Harley Van Belkolm feels free. He provides some insight into this passion of his, the culture that surrounds it and why he wouldn’t be doing anything else.
